oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Fan Fare Reunion Show - various performances
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Fan fare reunion show, featuring performances by Joe and Rose Lee Maphis (performers), Minnie Pearl (performer), the Fruit Jar Drinkers (performers), Alcyone Beasley (performer), Fiddlin' Sid Harkreader (performer), the Hoosier Hotshots (performers), and Lulu Belle and Scotty (performers).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Joe and Rose Lee Maphis; Minnie Pearl; Fruit Jar Drinkers; Alcyone Beasley; Fiddlin' Sid Harkreader; Hoosier Hotshots; Lulu Belle and Scotty
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: [Unidentified] introduces Joe and Rose Lee Maphis -- Joe Maphis talks and introduces the first tune -- Hot Time In Nashville (Joe and Rose Lee Maphis) -- [Unidentified] introduces Minnie Pearl -- Minnie Pearl talks -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- Minnie Pearl introduces the Fruit Jar Drinkers -- Hubert Gregory introduces the first tune -- [Unidentified tune] (Fruit Jar Drinkers) -- Minnie Pearl introduces the band of the Fruit Jar Drinkers -- Minnie Pearl introduces Alcyone Beasley -- Silver Threads Among The Gold (Alcyone Beasley) -- Minnie Pearl introduces Fiddlin' Sid Harkreader -- Harkreader talks about being proud to be around still for the Opry -- Harkreader talks about being with the Opry from the very beginning -- Mockingbird Breakdown (Fiddlin' Sid Harkreader) -- Minnie Pearl talks about WLS and introduces the Hoosier Hot Shots -- Gabe Ward talks and introduces the next tune -- [Unidentified tune] (Hoosier Hot Shots) -- Minnie Pearl introduces Lulu Belle and Scotty -- Lulu Belle and Scotty talk and introduce the next tune -- Have I Told You Lately That I Love You (Lulu Belle and Scotty) -- Minnie Pearl talks about country music fans being the greatest -- Closing statement (Minnie Pearl) -- Closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Fan Fair; Maphis, Joe, 1921-1986; Maphis, Rose Lee; Cannon, Sarah Ophelia, 1912-1996; Minnie Pearl; Fruit Jar Drinkers (Musical group); Beasley, Alcyone; Harkreader, Sidney J.; Hoosier Hot Shots (Musical group); Lulu Belle and Scotty;
